title: did my game just get drophacked

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i was playing ranked solo as thresh support and we were 100% going to win because i was carrying. as soon as i killed tristana with ignite my pinged jumped to 500 ms with attempting to reconnect at the top of my screen (my internet connection was fine). so after about a minute i exited the game to try to reconnect and it brought me back to the home screen in the client with no option to reconnect and the game is not in my match history. drophack or ???

replies.body: It sounds like something may have gone a little wonky with the server that game was taking place on and the game was ended earlier than it should have. Most likely everyone else was dropped as well, and no one will have gotten hit with any penalties for leaving it. Hit me back up and let me know if you're seeing any penalties after that match!
Drop hack doesnt exist in league. How did you test your internet connection?
